name: Her Quest!
description: This is a game made in a week. The idea was found when I was speaking on the phone with Her. I told her I should make a game named "Her Quest to find the Perfect Guy". And later so I did. Making  a small yet trollish game. Just for the sake of entertainment! But I am really glad I was able to make this from MV. It almost took my a long time to make it to Android.
